(Thank you  for being predictable Yanosh, now lets see what my new abilities
can do)

Lunarpine could smell Slayer approaching, he heard the missle launch, and
smell the exhaust coming toward him. With the grace of Fred Astaire he
charges forward causeing the missle to hit where he once stood, he ran
toward a nearby tree and used it to catapult him into the air in the
direction of Slayer. In the air Slayer had an advantage Lunarpines strategy
was to bring him down and fight on a level playing field.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 5:30 PM
Subject: Trainers at the Ark


> Oooh, this could get ugly. No counter chips in at least half the Maximals
> fighting...
>
> ::Slayer/Ramulus/Smokescreen/Proto::
>
> Slayer stops in the air, looking down at Lunarpine. The bot looked like he
> was smelling something.. Striker growls, realizing that Lunarpine could
smell
> him. Not wasting anymore time, Slayer aims his gun, firing a missile at
> Lunarpine.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hearing shots, Ramulus runs out of the Ark, grabbing a cloaking device on
his
> way and activating it. He disappears (to the eye), running out of the Ark
and
> firing at where Koj had said Prebon was.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen rushes out of the base, cloaked once again. Seeing a few shots
> emerge out of nowhere (one of the Trainers'), he fires at the spot,
running
> to the edge of the clearing of the Ark so he could get some cover.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Proto flies out of the Ark, cloaking himself as he opens fire on where Koj
> had said Prebon was.
>
>
>
>
